titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to transfer certain National Forest System land in the State of New Mexico.
Village of Santa Clara Conveyance Act of 2018
Village of Santa Clara Conveyance Act of 2018
Village of Santa Clara Conveyance Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
Village of Santa Clara Conveyance Act of 2018
This bill directs the Forest Service, upon request by the Village of Santa Clara, New Mexico, to convey to the village approximately 1,520 acres of National Forest System land at market value.
